name: Spilt Spells
description:
As an apprentice, you know you’re not allowed into the Sorceror’s private study. Now you’ve gone and released all the spells from his magic book! You must catch the spell cards and return them to the book before you he discovers your mistake, or else you’ll be scrubbing out the dragon toilets until the end of eternity…

Click on cards of the same type to collect combos and win points.
